#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define inp(a) scanf("%d",&a)
#define out(a) printf("%d\n",a)
#define inpll(a) scanf("%lld",&a)
#define outll(a) printf("%lld\n",a)

#define VI vector<int>
#define VLL vector<long long int>
#define PQI priority_queue<int>
#define PQLL priority_queue<long long int>
#define VP vector<pair<int,int> >
#define II pair<int,int>
#define VPII vector<pair<int,int> >
#define ll long long int
#define ull unsigned long long int

#define sz(a) (int)a.size()
#define mod 1000000007
#define mp make_pair
#define X first
#define Y second
#define pb push_back
#define rep(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)

int main(){

int t;
inp(t);
while(t--){

    ll time;
    inpll(time);
    ll hrs = time/100,mins=time%100;
    ll secs;
    inpll(secs);
    ll newmin = secs/60;
    if( secs%60 != 0 )
        newmin++;
    mins += newmin;
    if( mins >= 60 ){
        ll x = mins/60;
        hrs += x;
        mins -= x*60;
    }
    if( hrs >= 24 ){
        ll x = hrs/24;
        hrs -= x*24;
    }
    if( hrs == 0 && mins == 0 && secs%60 != 0 ){
			hrs=23;
			mins=59;
		}

    if(hrs <= 9 && mins <= 9)
        printf("0%lld0%lld\n",hrs,mins);
    else if(hrs <= 9 && mins > 9)
        printf("0%lld%lld\n",hrs,mins);
    else if(hrs > 9 && mins <= 9)
        printf("%lld0%lld\n",hrs,mins);
    else if(hrs > 9 && mins > 9)
        printf("%lld%lld\n",hrs,mins);
    }
return 0;
}
